body.name: Mounting Dream Studless TV Wall Mount for Most 26-60 Inch TVs, No Drill TV Mount with Loading Capacity 100lbs, Max Vesa 400 x 400mm, Drywall TV Wall Mount Bracket, Easy Install, Low Profile, MD6230-M
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 9 hrs 55 mins
features: NO STUD NO DRILL: Can't figure out how to find a stud to install your TV mount? Bored of getting a lot of tools and parts to drill in the wall? With Mounting Dream studless TV mount no drilling is required, less the need to find wood studs, just a hammer helps you install it rapidly.

WIDE COMPATIBILITY: Sturdy studless TV mount for most 26-60" TVs. Min. VESA is 100mm x 100mm, while max. VESA is 400mm x 400mm. Load capacity is up to 100 lbs. Please check TV VESA, TV weight, and compatible wall type before purchase (recommended for drywall, but not for brick, concrete, or concrete block).

DISTINCTIVE DESIGN: Easily lock and release your TV with the retractable pull strap. Drop-proof edge design to give your TV a stable home. Concealable magnet ends, can hide the drawstring after installation, and maintain the appearance of the TV.

LOW PROFILE TV MOUNT: Ultra-thin TV mount keeps the TV 1.26 inches from the wall, minimizing gaps and saving space significantly. With its low profile and very sleek appearance, the studless TV mount virtually blends the TV into the wall.

US-BASED CUSTOMER SUPPORT: Why are you waiting? Get your TV mounted! Any pre-purchase or installation issues? Support from the Mounting Dreams customer service team is fully committed to you all seven days a week!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for me!
reviews.reviewText: We picked up a 43” Fire TV for our guest room and wanted to put it on the wall. I decided that having success with other Mounting Dream products, I’d give this a try. It was on sale for around $15.I was able to get this mounted to the wall and the pieces put onto the tv in around 15 minutes alone. The tv easy snaps into place and feels sturdy.A couple points to note:I think if you lifted straight up for the bottom of the tv after being mounted, you could pull this mount out of the wall.It says it’ll support 100 pounds. The tv I used is 25 pounds so I’m well within the safe zone.Hopefully this holds up. It was super easy to put up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, easy to install, and close to the wall.
reviews.reviewText: This TV mount is great as long as you have a level on hand (your smart phone works) you'll be able to install this in less than 15 minutes measuring, installing and everything. Great product, with mi imal damage to the wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super simple set up
reviews.reviewText: Just need a hammer. Holds up my 55 inch TV perfectly! Great product if you don’t have a stud finder

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I still drove large nails into a stud. Didn't trust it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup 65 inch
reviews.reviewText: Very simple, but should be in an area that doesn’t have someone against it is ropes not wire. That’s was the tricky thing when looking at this picture of this when ordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best non stud mount you can buy
reviews.reviewText: this mount is very sturdy and well built. the nails go in the bracket at an angle and pass through two holes in the mount before entering the drywall, making it very durable and stable. this will fit any tv with screw holes in the back spaced 16 inches or less apart. it says up to 60 inch tv, but mine is a 70 inch and fits it perfectly. my tv weighs 50-60 pounds and the weight limit for this tv mount is listed as 100 , which is perfect for any tv up to 80-85 inches. the tv feels like is has a firm grip on the mount and is hard to move back and forth when sitting on the ledge of the mount. ive attached a few pictures of my 70 inch vizio, and views of behind the tv and above the tv to see the mount on the wall. 10/10 would recommend this for any tv needing to be mouted WITHOUT STUDS! no anchors, tools, studs, bolts, nothing required except a small hammer. everything else is provided , and you nail straight into the drywall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I see all the reviews saying they are skeptical of just having nails but when I put the nails in the wall, the mount felt very very sturdy so I'm surprised it works so well. I watched the tv for an hour to make sure it didn't move or drop and nothing. Been a few days and I'm confident it will stay for good. Great product for the price and ease.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not bad but not the greatest either it's working but me personally would rather have gone with one that's a bracket and goes in a stud think that would have been better for me
